title: Feature Pre-Planning Examples
description: Example answers for feature pre-planning to demonstrate quality standards

answers.feature_description: Add bulk contact import functionality that allows users to upload CSV files containing contact information and automatically import them into the system with validation and error handling.
answers.user_story: As a sales manager, I want to import contacts from CSV files so that I can quickly add leads from trade shows and external sources without manual data entry.
acceptance_criteria: Support CSV files up to 10MB in size
Validate email formats and phone number formats
Show real-time progress bar during import
Display detailed success/error summary after import
Allow column mapping for different CSV formats
Handle duplicate detection and user choice for resolution
Provide downloadable error report for failed imports
answers.user_workflow: 1. User clicks 'Import Contacts' button from contacts dashboard 2. File upload dialog opens 3. User selects CSV file 4. System shows column mapping interface 5. User maps CSV columns to contact fields 6. User previews first 5 rows 7. User clicks 'Start Import' 8. Progress bar shows import status 9. System displays results summary with success/error counts 10. User can download error report if needed
answers.technical_approach: Use React file upload component with drag-and-drop support. Parse CSV files using Papa Parse library on frontend for preview and validation. Send data to backend API in chunks of 100 records. Validate data server-side using existing contact validation logic. Use database transactions for atomic imports. Implement background job processing for large imports.
affected_components: ContactList component - add import button and progress overlay
ContactService - add import API endpoints and validation
Database - add import_batches table for tracking
New: ImportDialog component with file upload and mapping
New: ImportProgress component for status updates
New: ImportResults component for summary display
data_changes: Add import_batch_id field to contacts table
Create import_batches table with status, file_name, total_records, success_count, error_count
Add indexes on import_batch_id for performance
edge_cases: Invalid CSV format or corrupted file
Empty file or file with only headers
Duplicate email addresses within import and existing database
Special characters in contact names or company names
Very large files that exceed browser memory limits
Malformed data that passes initial validation but fails database constraints
answers.testing_strategy: Unit tests for CSV parsing, validation logic, and API endpoints. Integration tests for complete import workflow. Manual testing with various CSV formats from common sources (Excel, Google Sheets, CRM exports). Performance testing with large files (5MB+). Error scenario testing for all identified edge cases.
answers.rollback_plan: Feature flag to disable import functionality immediately. Database rollback script to remove specific import batch if needed. Clear error messaging guides users to manual data entry alternatives. Import history tracking allows identification of problematic imports.
